channel.title: Remove this (old)
channel.description:
I made a new client and want to upload it so other people can download it, so i added it to my archive in archive format zip so i could upload it on a site,but every time i upload then test it out on another computer when i click run client it says this
Client Is loading...... ----------------------- Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Gui Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: Gui at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: Gui. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .
I dont know why it is saying this because when i click run client on my computer it works perfectly fine some1 plz help

item.title: Remove this (old)

item.description:
@smokin_flax wrote:

did you take any files out of the client? or did you hide them?

are you sure you extracted the client on your other computer?

item.title: Remove this (old)

item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

It’s stating that because it can’t find the file: GUI.

I made a new client and want to upload it so other people can download it, so i added it to my archive in archive format zip so i could upload it on a site,but every time i upload then test it out on another computer when i click run client it says this
